title: engineApi
description: the API provided to each service at initialization time

commonName.description: the common name of the application (getter/setter)

config.description: the filled-up application configuration instance from <configDir>/iztiar.json core configuration file (getter/setter)

packet.description: the package instance of the calling '@iztiar/iztiar-core' core module (getter/setter)

pluginManager.description: the IPluginManager interface as instanciated by the core application (getter/setter)

exports.description: the whole list of the definitions exported by the calling '@iztiar/iztiar-core' core module
